Class ClassReferenceControl

java.lang.Object
org.dellroad.javabox.control.ConstantPoolControl
org.dellroad.javabox.control.ClassReferenceControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Control
public class ClassReferenceControl extends ConstantPoolControl
A simple ConstantPoolControl that restricts which classes can be referenced by ClassEntry's.
